sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_table_bldr_wzd.Validators</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>Validators</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var Validators = Class.create();

Validators.isValidAttachment = function isValidAttachment(sysId) {
    var res = {
        isValid: true
    };

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(TBWConstants.SYS_ATTACHMENT);
    gr.addQuery("sys_id", sysId);
    gr.query();

    if (!gr.hasNext()) {
        res.isValid = false;
        res.message = gs.getMessage('No attachment found');
    }

    return res;
};

Validators.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'Validators'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-24 11:49:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4102057c7711011066cfa9ff9a5a9968</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Validators</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AES Table Builder Wizard" source="sn_table_bldr_wzd">5fc95d0df025bde7fac20ba52d0ecc05</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="AES Table Builder Wizard">5fc95d0df025bde7fac20ba52d0ecc05</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4102057c7711011066cfa9ff9a5a9968</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-27 05:03:27</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
